Features NotifyWiFi X:
1. Notifications when connected to Wi-Fi.
• Displays a notification banner when connected to any network. • You can check the connection history in "Connection History". • Ability to disable notifications from whitelisted networks. • If you connect to a blacklisted network, Wi-Fi is automatically turned off.
2. Expansion of the Wi-Fi configuration menu.
• You can add features such as Pull to Update and Known Networks. • After connecting to a Wi-Fi network, its password can be checked and copied. • You can display additional information and disable RSSI limiting, etc.
3. Skip the lock screen password, for example when you are connected to a specific Wi-Fi.
• You can skip passwords when connecting to whitelisted networks, or you can skip passwords when the connected network is not blacklisted.
